text: Irina Berezhna, Russian: Irina Berezhnaya (13 August 1980 â€“ 5 August 2017) was a Ukrainian politician. She was born in Luhansk, Ukraine. She member of Party of Regions (since October 2007), a former People's Deputy of Ukraine, member of the fraction of the Party of Regions. Berezhna died in a car accident on the Adriatic coast on 5 August 2017 at the age of 36. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Irina Berezhna
